alert.note: Alert for Cherokee; Spartanburg (South Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued October 20 at 3:24PM EDT until October 20 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 400 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN SPARTANBURG AND NORTHWESTERN CHEROKEE COUNTIES... At 324 PM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 8 miles northwest of Gaffney to 14 miles south of Forest City to 13 miles north of Spartanburg, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Gaffney, Cowpens, Blacksburg, Mayo, Cowpens National Battlefield, Thicketty, Draytonville, and Fingerville. TORNADO...POSSIBLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
